title: Camp WeWow Weather Week Day 1: Curious Case of the Everlasting Storm
description:
It's Weather Week at Camp WeWow! Today, we're listening to one of our favorite episodes of Wow in the World, "Curious Case of an Everlasting Storm!" This week, we've got crafts, activities, and games up a storm for you, so be sure to check back for more tomorrow! Visit tinkercast.com/camp for directions to our daily activities and challenges. You can share your tinkerings and tales with us at tinkercast.com/share and at 1-888-7WOW-WOW for the chance to be featured at the “campfire” this Friday!

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
